Title: The 10-mile long road says farewell to the premier
Designer: Wang Gansheng (王干生)Zhang Wenda (章文达)
Publisher: Zhejiang jiaoyu chubanshe (浙江教育出版社)
Notes: Zhou Enlai passed away on 8 January 1976. The bus carrying his remains passed Tian'anmen Gate on 11 January. Public mourning was prohibited, but still huge crowds had gathered along the route for a silent homage.
